step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Try to bring your shoulder blades together and down smoothly.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second set starting well. Focus on a controlled backward and downward motion.
Good control here. Ensure the movement feels fluid and not jerky.
Excellent finish to the second set! You're doing great with these shoulder rolls.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Keep up the good work with your breathing and mobility.
